---
name: Data Error Report
about: Report incorrect, outdated, or missing legal source data
labels: data-quality
---

## Problem Summary

Describe the issue clearly (wrong text, missing article, incorrect status, etc.).

## Citation / Identifier

Provide the document identifier and provision reference if available.

## Expected Result

What should the server return?

## Actual Result

What did the server return?

## Source Link

Link to official Justel/EUR-Lex page that confirms the expected result.

## Additional Context

Any extra context that helps reproduce and triage the issue.
